We want players to never want to get off! Tons of content, waiting for you to enjoy.[/SIZE][/b][/font] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/yuronma2l1vy3ax/Perception.jar?dl=0][img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1l60OtXh.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.perception-rsps.com/community/][img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1l5Q0PDt.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.perception-rsps.com/vote/][img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1l5OpxjC.png[/img][/url] [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1l5RW27b.png[/img] [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1f7REqNJ.png[/img] Owner Grant [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1f7Yhf8K.png[/img] Developer Christian [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1f7Yhf8K.png[/img] Developer Faz [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1f7Yhf8K.png[/img] Developer Brian [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1gXwqd63.png[/img] [img]https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/1gY8KDXQ.gif[/img] [/center] First Two Hours Online: [img]http://gyazo.com/7b1b7217ef75918cf1877ef8d9d3284b.png[/img] [spoiler=Client Highlights] Depth Buffering HD Minimap SD, HD Toggleing HD Region based Fog HD Floor Texturing Perfected tweening Custom task bar icon Clean FPS Customizable Completionist Cape Account saving Small Auto Downloading Cache Auto Updating Client Zoom in and Zoom out middle mouse scroller Xp Counter [/spoiler] [spoiler=Server Highlights] 16+ Commands Donator Zone Full Nex 15+ Bosses 23 Working Skills Curses, Ancients, Lunars Auto Voting, Auto Donating Clan Chat Duo Slayer 9 Minigames Deposite Inventory and Equipment Pets Overloads Bonfires Inferno Adze Bones on altar Buying X Xp Locking [/spoiler] [spoiler=Videos] New Promotional Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJDG0yTrJok&feature=youtu.be [/spoiler] [spoiler=Updates!] Update [6/17/2015] Toggleable GameFrames are here! 317: [img]http://gyazo.com/e046df46f147bdea75d9ccd4e0f32632.png[/img] 459: [img]http://gyazo.com/6a8ea627ac2a8b93d2350a3db3fa3958.png[/img] 474: [img]http://gyazo.com/a00208317d4bfa98e8bdec152c646e60.png[/img] 525: [img]http://gyazo.com/efcbac29f7a0392e65c8f9fd27365d5e.png[/img] [/spoiler]

You overdid it with the merging of the media, looks messy imo. Don’t like the revision but Goodluck anyway

item.title: Perception - Exceptionally...Insightful
item.dc:creator: @Perception Perception_
item.description:
@Perception wrote:

[center]
[font=impact][SIZE=3]8 months, hundreds and hundreds of hours poured into coding and perfection. We want players to never want to get off! Tons of content, waiting for you to enjoy.[/SIZE][/font]




Owner Grant
Developer Christian
Developer Faz
Developer Brian


[/center]
First Two Hours Online:
[spoiler=Client Highlights]
Depth Buffering
HD Minimap
SD, HD Toggleing
HD Region based Fog
HD Floor Texturing
Perfected tweening
Custom task bar icon
Clean FPS
Customizable Completionist Cape
Account saving
Small Auto Downloading Cache
Auto Updating Client
Zoom in and Zoom out middle mouse scroller
Xp Counter
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Server Highlights]
16+ Commands
Donator Zone
Full Nex
15+ Bosses
23 Working Skills
Curses, Ancients, Lunars
Auto Voting, Auto Donating
Clan Chat
Duo Slayer
9 Minigames
Deposite Inventory and Equipment
Pets
Overloads
Bonfires
Inferno Adze
Bones on altar
Buying X
Xp Locking
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Videos]
New Promotional Video:


[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Updates!]
